pages.text: 55|17|( a l laoh) chea mcheasa kanleng teangpir nei preahatity reah ( pel rdauvokdaw  ning rdauvornga)  ning chea mcheasa kanleng teangpir nei preah  atity lich( pel rdauvokdaw  ning rdauvornga) .
55|18|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|19|trong ban thveu aoy samoutr pir( tuksaeab ning tukabrai) chuobaknea .
55|20|now rveang vea teangpir mean rneang khand min aoy chreabchaul knea .
55|21|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|22|kchkhyang  ning phkathm chenhpi vea teangpir( samoutr tuksaeab ning tukabrai) .
55|23|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|24|haey neavea thom  del thveudamnaer now leu phtaisamoutr hak  dauchchea phnom noh  kuchea kammosetthi robsa trong .
55|25|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|26|vi  teangoasa now leu phendei nung vineasa a nd reay .
55|27|haey vng ph kd r nei mcheasa robsa anak( mou ham meat) del mha  khpangkhpasa ning mha thkomthkaeng temuoyokt del now kngvongsa chea amt .
55|28|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|29|anak del now leumekh cheachraen chean  nung phendei tengte  buongsuong som pi trong .  trong riebcham kechchakar robsa trong chea riengrealthngai .
55|30|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|31|yeung nung thveukear touteat puok anak teangoasa  ao mnoussaalok  ning chin
55|32|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh

55|33|ao banda chin ning mnoussa lok.  brasenbae puok anakmean  samotthaphap ach thveudamnaer chhlangkat krobtisati nei mekh cheachraen chean  ning phendei  chaur puok anak chhlangkat choh .  puok anak min ach thveudamnaer chhlang  kat ban laey  leuklengte mean karoanounhnhat( pi yeung) .
55|34|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|35|mean ke banhchoun andataphleung  ning lohtheato romleay tow dot  ke teangpir( mnoussaalok  ning chin)  haey ke teangpir min ach reareang  ban laey .
55|36|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|37|nowpel del mekh be  reah bek( now thngai barlok) ku vea  mean pnrkrahm phka kau leab dauchchea be  r ng del kampoung pouh .
55|38|dau che  neah  tae nie k meat namuoy nei mcheasa robsa anak teangpir ( mnoussa lok ning chin) del anak teangpir bdeseth noh
55|39|haey now thngai noh  mnoussaalok  ning chin min trauv ke suor  ampi babakamm robsa ke laey .
